question_text: An MFD on a wired network is receiving print jobs but fails to send scans via email. Network tests confirm connectivity. What is the most likely cause?
answer_options: The device is not connected to a power source
The email server settings on the MFD are misconfigured
The MFD is out of toner
A paper jam is blocking outgoing communication
correct_answer: The email server settings on the MFD are misconfigured
explanation: Scans-to-email require proper SMTP settings configured in the MFD. Print jobs use different protocols and are often unaffected.
